isis.stitle: HEAT VENTILATION AIR CONDITIONING (HVAC), Orifice Tube System, Pre-March 2007 - 3200, 4100, 4200, 4300, 4400, 7300, 7400, 7500, 7600, 7700, 8500, 8600 - SPECIAL TOOLS - RECOVERY/RECYCLING/RECHARGING STATION

svcproc.title: RECOVERY/RECYCLING/RECHARGING STATION
svcproc.para: The Recovery/Recycling/Recharging Station (ZTSE4615) for R-134a is a totally integrated A/C service system, which recovers, recycles, evacuates, and recharges R-134a quickly and accurately (refer to Figure 83).

figure.caption: Figure 83. Recovery/Recycling and Charging Station, ZTSE4615

svcproc.para: With its built-in manifold, all A/C service work is done with one hookup. The unit is programmed at its panel-mounted keypad. Computerized controls and solenoids precisely monitor evacuation and charging time. It is designed to automatically shut off after the recovery cycle. A moisture indicator will change from yellow to green when recycling is complete.
